text.div:
Launch Context

The standard context for Questionnaire at launch time

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/sdc/CodeSystem/launchContext defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
patient Patient in context at launch time (FHIR Patient resource)
encounter Encounter context at launch time (FHIR Encounter resource)
location Location context at launch time (FHIR Location resource)
user User in context at launch time (FHIR Device, PractitionerRole, Practitioner, RelatedPerson, Organization or Patient resource)

name: LaunchContext
title: Launch Context
publisher: HL7 International - FHIR Infrastructure Work Group
description: The standard context for Questionnaire at launch time
